Judul: TECHNICAL ANALYSIS OF NARROW GOLD VEIN UNDERGROUND MINING A CASE STUDY IN PT ANTAM TBK UBPE PONGKOR
Abstrak: PT Antam Tbk UBPE Pongkor has discoverd narrow gold vein in its mining area. This narrow vein cannot be mined by using mechanized cut and fill mining method. Other methods which are resuing or shrinkage stoping underground mining method will be developed to mine these narrow veins. Technical design parameters for each proposed mining method based on the field data. Its consists of opening width, blasting pattern, supporting system, productivity, and break even cut of grade. Each method has its own advantages and disadvantages based on the technical analysis. As result, resuing method will produce cleaner are and higher COG, however need more support materials and explosives.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Firly R Baskoro, Tri Karian, Anzhari Wadiyan, Eko Sunarso, M. Rahman Ardhiansyah, Aryo P. Wibowo
Kata Kunci: mining method, narrow gold veins, resuing method, shrinkage stoping
